description:
Note: We don't consider International candidates.

Excited to Begin Your Sales Adventure?

Join our enthusiastic team as a Virtual Account Executive on a 1099 contract basis. Whether you're a seasoned sales expert or just beginning your career, this opportunity allows you to make a substantial impact while enjoying the perks of remote work. With our support, you can unlock your earning potential and craft a rewarding and fulfilling career.

Responsibilities for Virtual Account Executive:

  • Develop and nurture client relationships through effective communication
  • Create compelling and insightful product presentations
  • Conduct virtual demonstrations, showcasing key features and benefits
  • Strive to achieve individual and team sales targets
  • Clearly communicate value propositions to potential customers
  • Engage with warm leads, guiding them through the sales process
  • Maintain precise and up-to-date records of all sales activities

What's in it for You as a Virtual Account Executive at Our Organization?

  • Work remotely, eliminating commute times and allowing you to create a workspace that suits you
  • Benefit from an uncapped commission system, where your earnings are directly influenced by your performance in this 1099 role
  • No prior sales experience required; comprehensive training on our products/services, sales techniques, and virtual communication tools will be provided
  • No cold calling; we offer access to top-quality leads, enabling you to concentrate on closing deals and reaching your full potential

Start your fulfilling sales career with us and take the first step on your journey today!

Disclaimer: This is a 1099 commission only position. You will be offering financial products like IUL’s, Annuities, Life Insurance, etc. to people who have reached out requesting more information.
